amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the Family Funds limit of the Small Business Investment Company Program from $225,000,000 to $350,000,000, as passed by the Committee in 2013, which is zero subsidy and funded entirely through fees paid by investors and businesses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Risch. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2016) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the Family Funds limit of the Small Business Investment Company Program from $225,000,000 to $350,000,000, as passed by the Committee in 2013, which is zero subsidy and funded entirely through fees paid by investors and businesses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Risch.
